examples.example: 生活中充满了各种浪漫的瞬间，让我们感受到无尽的美好。

translate.english: Life is filled with all kinds of romantic moments, allowing us to feel endless beauty.

examples.example: 和心爱的人一起漫步在海边，享受着这浪漫的时光，真的很幸福。

translate.english: Walking along the seaside with the beloved one and enjoying this romantic time is really very happy.

examples.example: 周末，我们一起去看了一场浪漫的电影，度过了愉快的时光。

translate.english: At the weekend, we went to see a romantic movie together and had a pleasant time.
